榶字的基本解释

榶
táng
〔榶棣（
碗。d?）〕又作“唐棣”，一种树。

榶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［táng］
［《廣韻》徒郎切，平唐，定。］
碗。

榶字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　榶； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页544第26
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?徒郞切，音唐。木名。棣也。一名栘。【廣韻】引《爾雅》云：唐棣，栘。不从木。　又椀也。【荀子·正論篇】魯人以榶，衞人用柯，齊人用一革。【註】盌謂之榶，盂謂之柯。

榶字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
榶字的起名意思

暂无。

榶
Basic explanation of words
榶
táng
〔榶棣(
bowl. d?)] Also called "Tang Di", a kind of tree.
榶
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［táng］
["Guangyun" Tu Langqie, Ping Tang, Ding. ]
bowl.
榶
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　榶; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 544 26
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Tu Yunqie, Yin Tang. Wooden name. Di also. A 栘. [Guang Yun] Quoting from "Er Ya": Tang Di, Zhu. Not from wood.　It's also a bowl. [Xunzi · Zheng Lun Chapter] Lu people use 榮, guards use Ke, and Qi people use Yige. [Note] The bowl is called the 榶, and the 盂 is called the Ke.
